DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a team-based care (TBC) intervention, combining physician, nurse and pharmacist care improves BP control compared to usual care at 6 months among outpatients with uncontrolled hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Team-Based Care for Hypertension Management (TBC-HTA)
